trans-unit.source: Specifies the details of how a method is implemented.
You can apply this attribute to methods or constructors.

This attribute lets you customize the configuration of the method or constructor to which it applies by supplying a <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions> value to its class constructor.
The members of the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions> enumeration correspond to bit fields in the `CorMethodImpl` metadata table.

This means that information on the attribute cannot be retrieved at run time by calling the <xref:System.Reflection.MemberInfo.GetCustomAttributes%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method; instead, it is retrieved by calling either the `MethodInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags` or the `ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags` method.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value.
A bitmask representing the desired <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value which specifies properties of the attributed method.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value.
This constructor sets the `CorMethodImpl` bit fields in the metadata table.
The value of these flags can be retrieved at run time by calling the `MethodInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags` or `ConstructorInfo.GetMethodImplementationFlags` method.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value specifying properties of the attributed method.
A <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodCodeType"></xref> value indicating what kind of implementation is provided for this method.
Gets the <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value describing the attributed method.
The <xref href="System.Runtime.CompilerServices.MethodImplOptions"></xref> value describing the attributed method.
